ingredients.item: 1 medium Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Egg
Love Life Spelt, Quinoa, Red Rice & Wild Rice
4 sheets (from a 3x5g pack) Itsu Crispy Seaweed Thins

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200Â°C, gas mark 6. Put the sweet potato into a roasting tin, toss with the olive oil and season. Roast for 15 minutes then add the broccoli and roast for a further 10 minutes until coloured and tender.
Mix all the dressing ingredients together in a bowl and set aside. Cook the egg in boiling water for 7 minutes, or until hard boiled. Cool under running water, peel and slice.

Cook the spelt pouch according to pack instructions. Divide between 2 wide bowls, arrange the roasted vegetables over the top together with the remaining ingredients. Drizzle with the dressing and serve immediately.
